option.description: The file containing the structure (topology) and parameters of the molecules to be simulated.
The file containing the coordinates of the molecules to be simulated. This is typically the restart file from the last stage of setup or dynamics.
The root name of the output files produced by the simulation.
The number of steps of dynamics to perform.
The desired temperature of the simulation.
The desired pressure of the simulation.
Supply your own command file to set advanced pmemd options.
